content: meet vincent the cutest vampire bat in town he s perfect for halloween décor handmade gift for yourself or even a prop please note this is a pattern for making vincent the vampire bat amigurumi and not the finished doll the pdf is in us crochet terminology and it s only available in english skill level beginner materials needed * any yarns in black red orange white colours * crochet hook that matches your yarns * safety eyes * polyester fiberfill * stitch marker * sewing needle * scissor size i used cotton acrylic mix yarns 2 5 mm crochet hook and 3mm safety eyes vicent the vampire bat turned out in approximate height 4cm please note this pattern is designed by luvpiggy and it s for personal use only please do not copy edit sell or distribute this pattern you re welcome to sell the finished products - please credit the pattern to @theluvpiggy thank you if you do have any questions please don t hesitate to message me on instagram @theluvpiggy or email me at askluvpiggy@gmail com i look forward to seeing your creation
